content:
Yinghao MA (马英浩) is a senior student of School of Mathematical Science, PKU, majoring in Mathematics and Probability Theory. His research interests include Music Information Retrieval, Audio Signal Processing, Machine Learning and Probability Theory. His goal is to gain further understanding on auditory signals especially music, with information technology.
Besides, he is one of student conductors of Chinese Philharmonic Orchestra, Chinese Music Institute at PKU (see at Facebook). He is also an advocate of charitable activities (see at other experience).
He is now applying for Graduate studies, in pursuit of his passion in exploring new things and innovating new ideas.

title: 马英浩(Nicolaus) Yinghao MA
